name: All Deals Asia
tag_list: deals, deal, alldealsasia, coupons, discounts, singapore-deals, groupon, deal-com, group-buying
overview:
AllDealsAsia is Singapore and South East Asia’s first and largest one stop deal aggregation portal with over 300,000 registered email subscribers, 40,000 Facebook group members, 1 million monthly page views and 300,000 unique monthly website visits. AllDealsAsia collaborates with merchants and deal partners to actively source for the best deals in town, ranging from lifestyle, entertainment, travel, food and beverages, beauty and fun activities. The AllDealsAsia portal is available to consumers from Singapore and across South East Asia, namely Malaysia, Philippines, Hong Kong, Thailand and Indonesia as well as Australia.

To download our AllDealsAsia iPhone App, please visit http://www.alldealsasia.com/mobile/iphone. For Android App, please visit http://www.alldealsasia.com/mobile/android

milestones.description: Launch of AllDealsAsia iPhone App Version 1.0
milestones.source_description: AllDealsAsia iPhone App is now launched!
